response.overview: Mediation and new plans of realities are deepened in Estée Lauder – Hypnosis session (2018) by Michela de Mattei, part of a series of works created following the Skype conversations between the artist, and Estée Lauder, a Gloucester-based, Indian-born Myna bird, since September 2015. In this video, through the hypnosis technique, the artist tries to explore new levels of communication, questioning limits on conditions of captivity.
response.title: Estée Lauder – Hypnosis session
